description: Helconia "Desert Sunset", three protea blooms and foliage in a vase with a petroglyph decoration (figure with long paddle)

signed: on mount below image in pencil: [FRED SCHEEL]
title: Helconia, Desert Sunset, and Protea in Petroglyph Vase, Hawaii
